issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/198973

comment.body:
Unfortunately MV3 extension cannot update filters, so new rules will be available in one of the next extension update.
Until then, please add following rule:
```adblock
drstonebr.com,animefire.info,animesonliner4.com,coempregos.com.br,anitube.us,dattebayo-br.com,anitube.vip,hinatasoul.comssstik.io#%#//scriptlet('prevent-xhr', '//cdn.taboola.com/libtrc/unpkg/tfa.js')
```
to user rules.

By the way, please provide steps on how to reproduce the issue next time (in this case it's not obvious).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 10 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
Fixed in https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/bef2e45e01b7786803bfc5f8d79804f196fc897a yesterday.

The problem is that MV3 extension cannot update filters, so new rules will be available in one of the next extension updates.
Until then, please add following rule:
```adblock
nodejs.cn#%#//scriptlet('set-constant', 'adsbygoogle', 'emptyObj')
```
to user rules.

Hi. Cannot reproduce. 
Could you please test disabling modules one by one with checking?

comment.body:
Fixed, but the problem is that MV3 extension cannot update filters, so new rules will be available in one of the next extension updates.
Until then, please add following rules:

comment.body:
It seems that it's already fixed in the `AdGuard Base filter`, but the problem is that MV3 extension cannot update filters, so new rules will be available in one of the next extension updates.
Until then, please add following rule:
```adblock
||travelweekly.co.uk/AfoCampaign/
```
to user rules.

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/198973

issue.title: vipbox.to
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://vipbox.to/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fvipbox.to%2F) ### Comment > Please check the possibility that the domain `advsmedia.xyz` is functioning primarily as an ad-serving intermediary. It wraps actual stream links for example like: > > `javascript:void(window.open('https://advsmedia.xyz/live/?t=Flash&link=https://wikisport.best/embed/bt1.php&id=357889&w=https://vipbox.to/%27,%27ddd%27,%27width=1000,height=900%27))` > > The stream appears to be hosted at `https://wikisport.best/embed/bt1.php`, but it is embedded through advsmedia.xyz, which adds advertising and possibly controls navigation between streams. It may be worth checking whether the ads can be separated from the functional streaming component. > > Also similar websites: > > `https://streamsports.to/` > `https://streameast.plus/` > `https://fromsport.online/` > `https://pirlotv.site/` > `https://hesgoal.games/` > `https://score808.fyi/` > `https://score808.my/` > `https://live-tv.show/` > `https://score808.watch/` > `https://808score.pro/` > `https://sportlemon.site/` > `https://jokerstreams.tv/` > `https://soccerstreams.soccer/` > `https://vipbox.watch/` > `https://sportshub.watch/` > `https://lemonsport.live/` > `https://sportplus.ws/` > `https://footybite.soccer/` > `https://footybite.me/` > `https://batmanstream.watch/` > `https://jokerlivestream.co/` > `https://sportstream.one/` > `https://sport-plus.live/` > `https://jokerlive.stream/` > `https://buffstreams.vip/` ### Screenshots
